Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to five piercing attacks ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the 5th hit of the Basic Attack hits an enemy, it generates 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.
After activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, the next time Harumasa activates the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color> and hits an enemy with it, it generates 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer - Drift
Description.Desc:
During <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Shoot a ranged piercing attack and reposition towards the corresponding drag direction, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Falling Feather
Description.Desc:
After the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color>, a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, or a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Immediately shoot <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color> at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to aim at a target and release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
After drawing the bowstring and aiming, shoot <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color> at the target, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Ha-Oto no Ya
Description.Desc:
When the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> hits an enemy or the ground, it can generate 2/6/6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>. If there are no <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> on the field when any squad member applies an Attribute Anomaly to an enemy, generate 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
There can be up to 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> present at a time. If there are any <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> present when Harumasa fires and hits enemies with <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color> will activate and fire <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> at the enemies hit by <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color>, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> will apply <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> to enemies hit, stacking up to 8 times and lasting 10s, repeated triggers reset the duration. While a target has at least 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color>, they will be <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Quick Flash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Launch multiple piercing attacks ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Hidden Edge
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Pierces enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash
Description.Desc:
While there are <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> enemies on the field, Harumasa will enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state, switching <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru</color> for <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color>.

While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Rush forwards to the closest <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> enemy and execute a powerful slash, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the slash hits the target, it consumes 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color>. With less than 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> will be removed from the enemy. Before <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> is removed, repeatedly press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to repeatedly use <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color>. While no <color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</color> enemies exist on the field, Harumasa leaves the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Feather</color> to quickly follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color>.
During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash
Special Attack: Nowhere to Hide
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Launch an arrow forward, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Launch daggers and an enhanced arrow ahead, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the enhanced arrow hits an enemy or the ground, it generates 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run
Chain Attack: Kai - Hanare
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleash a piercing attack on enemies in a large area ahead then fire an enhanced arrow, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
When the arrow hits the ground, it generates 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Zanshin
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleash a piercing attack on enemies in a large area ahead, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Braced Bow
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash a piercing attack at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Yugamae
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Yugamae - Slash
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Unleash a series of slashes at enemies ahead, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1201001.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer (1st, 2nd, and 3rd hit)

1201002.Name: Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer (4th and 5th hit)

1201006.Name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run

1201008.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash

1201009.Name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash (Quick launch)

Name: Core Passive: Day Break
Additional Ability: Overclock
Desc: The CRIT Rate of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>10.6%</color>, and when Harumasa's <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</color>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</color> increases the CRIT DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> by <color=#2BAD00>6%</color>.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character:
When Harumasa's attacks hit Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomaly, his DMG increases by 40%. When Harumasa's <color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</color> hits Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomaly, it will apply 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> to the target.

Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</color> increases the CRIT DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> by <color=#2BAD00>12%</color>.

1.Name: "High Spirit"
1.Desc: The maximum stack limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> from <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Ha-Oto no Ya</color> increases to 14 stacks. When an <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quiver</color> is triggered, 2 consecutive <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> will be fired at the target.
1.Desc2:
"I'm not like some stubborn idiots who insist on facing the enemy head-on."
"Be it a straightforward assault or an underhanded attack from the shadows, anything that gets me off work earlier is good in my eyes~"

2.Name: Languish
2.Desc: When using an <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, Harumasa gains 7 stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</color>, up to a max of 7 stacks. While possessing <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</color>, the DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> increases by 50%. Consume 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</color> once <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> ends.
2.Desc2:
"Don't look at me like that, I'm actually real frail, y'know~"
Harumasa lazily sprawls across his office desk.
"So... how 'bout picking someone else for this mission?"

3.Name: White Lies
3.Desc2:
"...Don't worry, this isn't enough to kill me."
He wipes the blood from the corner of his mouth with a smile and readies his bow once more.
"After all, I'm going to live to make it everyone's problem."

4.Name: Occasionally Motivated
4.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> now lasts for 20s. When <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</color> hits enemies, Harumasa gains 30 Decibels once per use of this skill. Upon activating <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, apply the maximum stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</color> to all on-field enemies.
4.Desc2:
Harumasa is occasionally full of energy and motivation...
When there's only five minutes left until he can get off work.

5.Name: No One Knows
5.Desc2:
"I want vacations, freedom, to be happy every day!"
"Just kidding. I want to live."

6.Name: Tacit Understanding
6.Desc: After <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color> hits Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomalies, Harumasa will ignore 15% of the target's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</color> for 12s. Every 12 times an enemy is hit by <color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</color>, trigger an extra electromagnetic explosion, dealing 1,500% of Harumasa's ATK to the target as <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
6.Desc2:
"My master taught me a lot of things, like how to draw a bow, how to wield a blade, and how to survive in this world with this body of mine."
"...What happened after that?"
"Well, after that... he left me."
